# AQUALIVIA™ Warranty Policy (Customer-Friendly Version)
At AQUALIVIA™, we stand behind the quality of our water treatment systems. Every product is carefully built to last, and we’re proud to offer strong warranty coverage to give you peace of mind.
### What’s Covered
- **Mineral Tanks:** 10 years (up to 13" × 54"), 5 years for larger tanks.
- **Control Valves:** 5 years.
- **Brine Tanks:** 5 years.
- **Accessories & Components:** 1 year.
- **AQUAREX™ Whole House Filter:** 5 years.
- **OZONEX™ Ozone Systems:** 1 year.
- **AquaVRay™ UV Systems:**
    - Chambers: 10 years
    - Controllers: 3 years
    - Lamps & Quartz Sleeves: 1 year
- **HydroClear™ & AquaRevive™ RO Systems:** 3 years (system only)
### What’s Not Covered
- Regular-use consumables (filters, resins, membranes, UV lamps, cartridges).
- Damage caused by misuse, freezing, flooding, power surges, or improper installation.
- Products used with non-AQUALIVIA™ parts or outside normal water conditions.
### How to Make a Claim
1. Contact our Support Team with proof of purchase.
2. We’ll give you a **Return Authorization (RA)** number if the claim qualifies.
3. Ship the product back (prepaid). If approved, we’ll repair or replace it.
### Our Promise
We’ll repair, replace, or provide a comparable solution if your system has a covered defect. Our goal is to make sure your AQUALIVIA™ system works the way it should, so you can enjoy clean, pure water with confidence.
👉 For warranty support, please contact AquaLiviaUSA@gmail.com.

Product Name: OZONEX™ Ozone Generator
Key Product Features:
Key Highlights for OZONEX™

Eliminates Bacteria & Viruses: Chemical-free disinfection with ozone.

Oxidizes Problem Metals: Removes iron, manganese, and magnesium.

Targets Iron-Related Bacteria: Stops staining and slime buildup in plumbing.

Odor Control: Neutralizes rotten egg, stale, and musty smells.

Premium Water Quality: Improves taste, clarity, and overall experience.

Eco-Friendly & Efficient: No chemicals, safe for families and the environment.

Description:
The OZONEX™ Ozone Generator is a premium water treatment system that delivers advanced oxidation and chemical-free disinfection. Harnessing the power of ozone, it eliminates bacteria, viruses, and iron-related bacteria while oxidizing iron, manganese, and magnesium for easy removal. It also destroys unwanted odors — including rotten egg, stale, and musty smells — leaving your water crisp, clean, and refreshing.
Ideal for well water applications, luxury residences, and commercial properties, OZONEX™ provides a complete solution for both safety and comfort. With its eco-friendly design and powerful performance, it protects plumbing, eliminates staining, and ensures your water is as pure and enjoyable as nature intended.

    - Chambers: 10 years

### What’s Not Covered
- Regular-use consumables (filters, resins, membranes, UV lamps, cartridges).
- Damage caused by misuse, freezing, flooding, power surges, or improper installation.
- Products used with non-AQUALIVIA™ parts or outside normal water conditions.
